attributes.action: Exempt all two wheeled motorcycles from paying road fund licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Non or low emission vehicles are exempt or pay very little RFL. They ALL however cause damage to road surfaces. ALL motorcycles pay RFL to maintain the upkeep of UK Roads so why shouldn't cars who cause more damage than motorcycles.I thought that was what RFL was for to pay for road repairs. NOT A GREEN TAX!!

rejection.details: Please remove all the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
